kALI:

"Well"said the femme"If you want to keep your neutralyty we don't 
have any trouble with us... But here exist factions that they don't 
care about neutral ideals and they might attack you as us... if you 
rather we can offer an alliance and exchange tech-reseach and militar-
suppor in case that some of us were attacked."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> Belthassan:
> It is a logical move... for you. However, my faction has made no 
> enemies yet, and I am convinced that fighting your enemies will 
bring 
> hatred on us. We are not innocent bystanders, but we are neutrals, 
and 
> I intend to stay as long as possible. If you want to try to 
convince 
> me, I am ready to hear your arguments.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Kali::
> > 
> > Kali opened the com link and said "I'm Kali, Our faction sugesst 
a 
> > reciprocal non-agression deal, plus we can exchange knowledge and 
> > help in case that other team try to fight against each team who 
> > belong to this deal"
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., wingedwarrior41@h... wrote:
> > > Belthassan:
> > > Interesting... Predacons, I am Commander Belthassan of the 
> > > Tripredacus. I would like to get more information on this 
> alliance. 
> > > Please tell me more.
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > Kali::
> > > > 
> > > > Kali send a message following Shivah's command, and send this 
> > > message 
> > > > using the Tripedocus' and D. E. D.'S fecuencies.
> > > > 
> > > > "Predacons of BlackFortress wants to get an alliance with 
yours 
> > > > factions"
